title: Keep full records
context: §36-2 Keep full records. The director of finance shall keep, or cause to be kept, in appropriate books, a clear, distinct, and full record of all the transactions and business of the director&rsquo;s department. [CC 1859, §471; RL 1925, §1245; RL 1935, §2204; RL 1945, §5805; RL 1955, §132-5; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §14; am L 1963, c 114, §1; HRS §36-2; gen ch 1985]
